function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of privacy in contact-tracing initiatives","Impact":"Potential violation of civil rights and privacy","Mitigation":"Implement privacy-focused contact-tracing technologies and transparent data protection measures","Technologies":"Privacy-preserving contact-tracing apps, encrypted data storage","People":"Members of the community, individuals with Covid-19 symptoms","Owner":"Governments, tech corporations"},{"Description":"Opaque development of pandemic management technologies","Impact":"Risk of unethical practices and lack of transparency","Mitigation":"Increase transparency in the development process and involve independent oversight","Technologies":"Open-source development, independent auditing","People":"Members of the community, public health advocates","Owner":"Government, pharmaceutical companies"},{"Description":"Unknown impact of technology-enabled pandemic management strategies","Impact":"Uncertainty about the effectiveness and long-term implications of the strategies","Mitigation":"Conduct rigorous testing and evaluation of the technology-enabled strategies","Technologies":"Data analytics, machine learning for prediction, public health surveillance systems","People":"General population, vulnerable population groups","Owner":"Public health agencies, academic research institutions"}]}
